definition: variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: Now why dost thou cry out aloud?
sentences.chinese: 现在你为何大声哭号呢。

sentences.english: Since heartbreaking is inevitable, why should I be head over heels in love?
sentences.chinese: 明知道伤心总是难免，为何我还要一往情深。

sentences.english: Way back at the start of the semester when we asked,Why believe in souls?
sentences.chinese: 学期一开始的时候我们研究过为何要相信灵魂的存在？

sentences.english: Why is there sadness in my heart?
What did he think was going on?
sentences.chinese: 他对时局演变的看法为何？

sentences.english: It's so obvious, why didn't they have them before?
sentences.chinese: 这就很显而易见，为何之前的人没想到呢？

sentences.english: While homesickness can be dealt with, can it be prevented?
sentences.chinese: 当思乡病能够被解决时，为何不避免呢？

sentences.english: Why does Bulgarian Rose Otto solidify at times?
sentences.chinese: 为何保加利亚玫瑰油经常凝固？

sentences.english: I will say unto God my rock, Why hast thou forgotten me?
sentences.chinese: 我要对神我的磐石说，你为何忘记我呢。

sentences.english: Why do they go after Mumbai?
Why did he let them suffer such cruel hardships?
sentences.chinese: 祂为何容让他们饱受如此残酷的虐待？
到底这种知识所为为何？

sentences.english: This is why Pope Adrian IV set out to destroy Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 这是为何亚德连四世打算要毁灭爱尔兰。

sentences.english: Sir Muir said he understood why Dr Campbell had withdrawn.
sentences.chinese: 缪尔爵士称，他明白坎贝尔博士为何退出了专家组。

definition: dialectal equivalent of 為什麼|为什么[wei4 shen2 me5]
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
to go to the bottom of a matter/after all/when all is said and done/(in an interrogative sentence) finally/outcome/result
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
